title: Defi Credit Union Via Crowd-staking
description: Most access to credit in Africa is done via traditional credit unions, which is limited by factors like; Trust, Familiarity & Capital risk.
solution: Crowd-staking leverages the Cardano staking & Plutus SCs to eliminate the problems currently experienced with using the Esusu/Ajo system.
experience: Our Team has a combined experience of 35 years in blockchain, finance, machine learning, business analytics, African business & big data.
